section.title: Introduction
p: Lexis Advance® offers a variety of ways for you to deliver your search results.
This tutorial shows you how to print, download, and email:
For these examples, we ran a search and selected some documents for delivery, viewed a full document, and displayed a Shepard's report for it.
We'll take a look at delivering a Shepard's® report later in this tutorial.
You can print, download, and email results using these icons, which appear on search results, work folders, history, and other pages.
All you need to do is:
To deliver multiple documents, first select their checkboxes.
You can also deliver a document you are viewing.
Although the print, download, and email forms are similar, we'll review them separately.

section.title: Printing Documents
p: Let's start with the Print form.
If you have not already done so, this link lets you install the LexisNexis® Print and Download utility.
This easy-to-install utility streamlines the print and download request processes.
Select the link if you want to install the utility, or select Dismiss to continue without installing it.
If you selected any documents, they appear on the "Selected Documents" tab.
You can clear the checkbox of any document you don't want to print.
In most situations, the "Basic Options" tab lets you choose to print selected documents or your results list.
Note that if you did not select any documents, you can print only the results list.

section.title: Downloading Documents
p: Now let's review the Download form.
Selected documents appear on this tab, and you can clear the checkbox of any document you don't want to download.
In most situations, the "Basic Options" portion of the form lets you choose to download selected documents or your results list.
If you did not select any documents, you can download only the results list.
To download the documents, select this option.
Choose from available document types.
If you choose PDF or Docx, you can also choose to download documents in 1 file or separate files.
Select this checkbox to download in ZIP format.
Choose your format options by selecting that tab.
These format options are the same as those for printing.
Content-specific options vary depending on what types of items you are downloading.
Choose your options for each content type, then select the Download button to download your items.
Follow the on-screen instructions to open or save them.

section.title: Emailing Documents
p: Now let's review the Email form.
In most situations, the "Basic Options" tab lets you choose to download selected documents or your results list.
Enter up to 5 email addresses in the To box, separated by a semicolon (;).
Recent recipients' email addresses appear here. Choose an address and select Add to include that recipient.
Use the recommended text or enter your own for the email subject line.
You can enter and format up to 4,000 characters to be included in the email.
Choose from available document types.
If you choose PDF or Docx, you can also choose to download documents in 1 file or separate files.
Select this checkbox to download in ZIP format.
Choose your format options by selecting this tab.
These format options are the same as those for printing and downloading.
Content-specific options vary depending on what types of items you selected.
Choose your options for each content type, then select the Email button to send your items.
The "Document Delivery" window appears while your email request is processed.
Closing the window will not affect your email delivery.
